prompt: Edit the uploaded manicure photo. PRESERVE: Nails and manicure 100% identical — completely protected area. No changes to nail color, shape, finish, length, design, or any detail. Nails must remain pixel-identical to original. Skin texture preserved with visible pores — no smoothing, no airbrushing. BACKGROUND: [BG_TYPE]. HAND ACCESSORY: [HAND_ACCESSORY] — sleeve should slightly cover the palm area, realistic fabric texture. NAIL DECOR: [NAIL_DECOR] — must not touch or overlap nails. SETUP: Soft studio lighting, subtle depth gradient. Ultra-photorealistic, high-quality fashion photography look. Sharp focus. Original dimensions — do not resize.
